price: Na Mwenyezi Mungu amekukunjulieni ardhi kama busati.
footnotes: Na Mwenyezi Mungu ameifanya ardhi iliyo kunjuliwa ili mpate kwenda humo katika njia zenye wasaa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
